Class MovingImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D
        • java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double
          • beats.MovingImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApproachCircle, Beat

    public class MovingImage
extends java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double
    The superclass for all images that move
    Version:
    5/15/15
    Author:
    Alek Antic
    See Also:

                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int w,
                   int h)
        Creates a new moving image from a file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the image file to be used for the circle
        x - the x value of the moving image
        y - the y value of the moving image
        w - the width of the moving image
        h - the height of the moving image

        Parameters:
        windowWidth - width of the window the moving image is in
        windowHeight - height of the window the moving image is in
